message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Iterator<PGPSecretKeyRing> it = skrCollection.getKeyRings();
PGPSecretKeyRing skr = it.next();
PGPSecretKey skey = skr.getSecretKey();
<<<explanation>>>: You are using the Iterator.next() method correctly to get the next PGPSecretKeyRing from the skrCollection. This method returns the next element in the iteration. If the iteration has no more elements, it will throw NoSuchElementException. In your case, you are using it to get the next PGPSecretKeyRing from the skrCollection. After getting the PGPSecretKeyRing, you are getting the PGPSecretKey from it.
